Text:
P.s.:
This is a 16-bit application, so there would be some bugs with the intallation under SP2 Windows platform.

But it's a very good program, so

If somebody know how to fix it, please write the method to comments!
Thanks a lot!
Typically to get around the problem, right click the install file, choose properties, select the compatibility tab, select compatibility mode for Windows 95... Done!

Thank You,
But (in my case) not so easy to solute the problem.
I've tried it, but doesn't work.

It the installer is started, but freeze when start to coping files...

Any other tipp?

Heureka!

If there are problems with installation, try to install it in safe mode. For me it's work...

Bye
I'f you got a problem "Runtime error: Out of memory", just go to Start - Run "msconfig" - Boot.ini - Advanced settings - MaxMeM => 512 and the problem should be solved ... :)

I could find no serial with this release!!
Help please!!
Sorry, made a stupid mistake no serial needed!!

the trick with the msconfig is indeed working. but it's very frustrating, because the computer then is very slow. it works only with 512megabyte memory.

is there no other solution to this problem??
